TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ControlIDConverter extends System.ComponentModel.StringConverter

summary.span: 提供检索当前容器中控件 ID 的列表的类型转换器。

span.span: Provides a type converter that retrieves a list of control IDs in the current container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类派生自类，并提供以在设计时环境中的属性网格控件中显示的控件 Id 的列表。The class derives from the class and provides a list of control IDs for display in a property grid control in design-time environments. 类也可作为类的基类和类，是 Web 控件和分别支持验证属性特性的控件的类型转换器。The class also serves as the base class for the and classes, which are type converters for Web controls and controls that support validation property attributes, respectively. 有关类型转换器的详细信息，请参阅[如何： 实现类型转换器](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90373a3f-d8c8-492d-841c-945d62393c56)或[通用类型转换](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/49253ae6-7657-4810-82ab-1176a6feeada)。For more information about type converters, see [How to: Implement a Type Converter](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90373a3f-d8c8-492d-841c-945d62393c56) or [Generalized Type Conversion](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/49253ae6-7657-4810-82ab-1176a6feeada). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用需要的类中呈现控件的 ID。The following code example demonstrates how to use the in a class that requires a to render the ID of a control. `DebugInfoControl`是一个简单控件，输出包含由当前的 Web 窗体控件上的一些信息。The `DebugInfoControl` is a simple control that prints out some information on a control contained by the current Web Form. 其`ControlID`修饰的属性可为指定作为要用于该属性。Its `ControlID` property is decorated with a that designates the as the to use for that property. `DebugInfoControl`重写`Render`方法以打印输出中的目标控件有关的信息控件。The `DebugInfoControl` overrides the `Render` method to print out information about the target control in a control. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.ControlIdConverter_1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ControlIdConverter_1/CS/debuginfocontrol.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.ControlIdConverter_1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ControlIdConverter_1/VB/debuginfocontrol.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何`DebugInfoControl`可在 Web 窗体连同控件来显示有关的信息控件。The following code example demonstrates how the `DebugInfoControl` can be used in a Web Form along with an control to display information about the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.ControlIdConverter_1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ControlIdConverter_1/CS/debuginfocs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.ControlIdConverter_1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ControlIdConverter_1/VB/debuginfovb.aspx#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 永远不应直接访问的类型转换器。You should never access a type converter directly. 相反，通过调用适当的转换器对象。Instead, call the appropriate converter by using a object. 有关详细信息，请参阅中的示例。For more information, see the examples in .

in all cases.

span.span: Classes that derive from the override this method to provide their own filtering mechanism.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法调用每个控件的容器中找到。The method is called on each control found in the container. 控件 ID 仅添加到如果该方法返回`true`。The control ID is only added to the if the method returns `true`.
